welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bagumbayan, Philippines! Get ready to experience the charm of this historic city known for its beautiful beaches, rich culture, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Bagumbayan has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, it serves as the main hub for Philippine Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at the airport, serving both domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Also known as the Domestic Terminal, it serves as the hub for low-cost carriers such as Cebu Pacific and AirAsia.

wifi.note: Limited to 2 hours per device per day.
